thread.section_title: Laptopscreen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laptopscreen | www.laptopscreen.com
thread.title: Michel Charlebois

author: Michel Charlebois
title: Michel Charlebois
text:
I am one that purchased a screen from Hong Kong for a couple of bucks cheaper (wrong). Never again. Made contact with Laptopscreen and was able to chat online with a human. Discussed the screen model and Laptopscreen confirmed the unit I needed. Three days after the purchase I received the screen in good shape and installed under 10 minutes. Laptop total price and postage was no higher then Hong Kong.
Thank you and I preaching your company to all who listen.
Michel
Ottawa Ontario
